name: Move Blocks
description:
A calming game about a cat inside a box.
Control with the mouse, click on the desired object and use the direction of the mouse to push them in the directions you need. You need to clear the way for the cat in the box so that she can escape!

Move Blocks - A game in which the player controls the mouse and by clicking the mouse moves objects and clears the way for the cat inside the box.

Control:
Left mouse button - move objects

Game Features:
- Visual style
- Relaxing Game
- Difficulty
